text: The Salón Metropolitano (or simply Metropolitano) is a convention and exhibition facility inside the Alto Rosario Shopping in downtown Rosario, Argentina. Located at 501 Junín Street, the 54,000-square-foot (5,000 m2) building offers six different rooms for concerts, meetings, banquets and classes. In 2007, the facility was expanded from 3,200 to 10,000 seating capacity for theatre and its total space was duplicated. ==Rooms== The facility can be sub-divided into six new rooms. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Room name ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Area ! scope="col" colspan="4"| Capacity |- ! scope="col" | Theatre ! scope="col" | Meetings ! scope="col" | Banquets ! scope="col" | Classroom |- ! scope="row"| Metropolitano 1 | 1,960 m2 | 2,400 | 2,400 | 1,700 | |- ! scope="row"| Metropolitano 2 | 2,475 m2 | 3,200 | 3,500 | 2,200 | |- ! scope="row"| Independencia | 720 m2 | 950 | 240 | 550 | |- ! scope="row"| Libertad | 427 m2 | 500 | 500 | 280 | 100 |- ! scope="row"| Panorámico | 400 m2 | 500 | 500 | 280 | 100 |- ! scope="row"| Contemporáneo | 380 m2 | 500 | 500 | 280 | 100 |} ==Concerts== The following is a list of the most notable performances: *Ricky Martin – 6–7 March – 2 November 2016, on his One World Tour *Maluma – June 23 – December 9, 2016, on his Pretty Boy, Dirty Boy World Tour *Jesse & Joy – 18 September 2016 *Lali – 6 October 2016, on her Soy Tour ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Rosario, Santa Fe Category:Convention centres in Argentina
title: Salón Metropolitano
